title: Paper Moon: Goodnight, sleep tight: Paper Moon keeps watch over the world until, one night, he disappears. Will Paper Moon return to the night sky?
description: Paper Moon is round, old and â€¦ sleepy. Against a prismatic palette of intriguing textures, Paper Moon slips away to dream his own dreams. Children and adults alike will enjoy the soothing visuals and musical verse of this charming bedtime story.
author: R.M. Hedgcoth
